title: MicroLayout Library
description: If you're working on an IoT project with a display, then you're almost certainly wanting to show information to a user. Drawing that information using drawing primitives can be both cumbersome and non-portable. We at Wilderness Labs have released our MicroLayout library to help .NET developers easily create lightweight HMIs for their projects.

frontMatter.title: MicroLayout Library
frontMatter.subtitle: Using the lightweight, MCU-optimized Meadow.Foundation HMI UI library with Meadow.
